article:
{{Infobox person |birthname=Benedict Sean Taylor
| birth_date = birth_place = Hampstead, London
}} Benedict Sean Taylor Born 1960 , the eldest of 6 children, to Father,
Richard, a documentary film maker & Allegra, a writer. Lived in Nigeria until
1965 - brought up in London. Now based near Hampton Court in West London Married
to Kate, an editor. 3 children; Jay, Freya and Kalila. Started working as a
child actor in 1969 with the Royal Shakespeare Company. Concentrated solely on
acting and voice-overs until 1985 Expanded creative interests to include event
production, music, musical production, DJ work and documentary film making
